short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Edit web pages directly within the Chrome tab and capture screenshots effortlessly with this extension.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Unlock a new level of web interaction with EditPager, the ultimate Chrome extension for on-the-fly webpage editing and capturing! Whether you're a designer, developer, or just looking to make quick tweaks, EditPager empowers you to:

Edit Web Pages Directly: Make real-time changes to any webpage's text, images, and styles right within your Chrome tab. See your edits instantly and refine your content as you go.
Take Instant Screenshots: Capture high-quality screenshots of your edited pages or the entire webpage with just a click. Perfect for documenting changes or sharing your work with others.
With a user-friendly interface and powerful editing tools, EditPager makes webpage customization and capture effortless. Try it today and transform the way you interact with the web!
